Course Section Definition Public Notes:
Before registering the course, please complete French Language Questionnaire to determine which course level to start: https://fhis.air.arts.ubc.ca/french-placement-questionnaire-tool/  

If you have experience of French 11, French 12, or French Immersion, you are not allowed to stay in FREN 101.  

View full course overview: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/fren101/  

Contact us here: https://fhis.ubc.ca/undergraduate-advising-contact-form/

Course Section: FRST_V 110-101 - Land One: First-year Integrative Seminar
FRST_V 110-L01 - Land One: First-year Integrative Seminar
FRST_V 110-T01 - Land One: First-year Integrative Seminar

Course Section Definition Public Notes: Select one Discussion from sections L1A, L1B, L1C, L1D, L1E, L1F, L1G, L1H, L1I, L1J, L1K, L1L, L1M, L1N, L1P, L1Q, L1R, L1S.
Select one Discussion from sections L1A, L1B, L1C, L1D, L1E, L1F, L1G, L1H, L1I, L1J, L1K, L1L, L1M, L1N, L1P, L1Q, L1R, L1S.
This online discussion has a synchronous scheduled meeting time.

Course Section: GEOS_V 102-101 - Our Changing Environment: Climate and Ecosystems
Course Section Definition Public Notes:
This is a blended learning lecture and has a mix of in-person and asynchronous online components. Asynchronous online lectures are held during the Friday scheduled class time and in-person lectures are held during the Monday and Wednesday scheduled class times in GEOG 100.
Select one lab from sections L01, L02, L03, L03, L04, L05, L06, L07, L08, L09, L10, L11, L12.

Course Section: GEOS_V 102-102 - Our Changing Environment: Climate and Ecosystems
Course Section Definition Public Notes:
Enrollment in this section (GEOS 102, section 201) is reserved for students with course conflicts or otherwise unable to attend in person during M/W class time. 
This asynchronous online lecture does not have a scheduled meeting time.
To attend the lab online or in-person, select L06.
To attend the lab online, select L09.
The final exam must be completed in-person during the scheduled exam time.
